name: ply1bascl2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))

stmt.origin: biimpi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))

stmt.origin: eleq2i(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c2), cfv(cps1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 =(Base `(1o[mPoly]c2))
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
⊣ (PwSer1 ` c2)=(PwSer1 ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c2), cfv(cps1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(1o[mPoly]c2)))
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
⊣ (PwSer1 ` c2)=(PwSer1 ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(1o[mPoly]c2)))
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

comment: A univariate polynomial is a multivariate polynomial on one index. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Mar-2015.)
